text: Personal protective equipment, often abbreviated to PPE are garments and other things that are warn to protect against certain hazards. == Examples == Examples of PPE include: * Respirator * Hazmat suits * Safety glasses * Helmets\ hard hats * Goggles * Gloves * Safety shoes * Reflecting jackets * Ear plugs == Other websites == * IS Code for personal protective equipment's Category:Protective clothing
title: Personal protective equipment
